text: Lachemilla rupestris is a species of plant in the family Rosaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Lachemilla rupestris has lateral segments of leaves with yellow-brown membranaceuos basal stipules on it. The flowers have 2-4 carpels that are 2.5-3 mm long. ==References== ==Sources== * Romoleroux, K. & Pitman, N. 2004. Lachemilla rupestris. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
